subject: Technology
topic: Soochna Prodyogiki (IT): Networking aur Cyber Security
question_en: What is the difference between LAN, WAN, and MAN?
question_hi: LAN, WAN aur MAN ka matlab kya hai?
A_en: A Local Area Network (LAN) is a network covering a small geographical area, a Wide Area Network (WAN) covers a larger geographical area, and a Metropolitan Area Network (MAN) covers an intermediate area between LAN and WAN.
A_hi: एक Local Area Network (LAN) एक ग्रुपकारी एक ध्यानशील करने के लिए अनुवाद है।
B_en: A LAN is a network of computers connected to each other in a limited geographical area. A WAN is a network that connects computers across a wide geographical area. A MAN is a network connecting computers in a city.
B_hi: एक LAN एक कंप्यूटरों के समाधि करने के लिए एक अनुवाद है।
C_en: A Local Area Network (LAN) is a network of computers connected to each other within a limited area such as an office building or a small city. A Wide Area Network (WAN) covers a large geographical area, spanning across cities, states, or even countries. A Metropolitan Area Network (MAN) is a network covering a city's area.
